simple.description: If quantization >0 we will quantize our Lanczos kernal to convert trigonometric calucations to be a rounded lookup. This trades off speed for precision. If you use quantization you should make sure it is not too small (>1e3)
"a" determines the size fo teh Lanczos kernal for interpolating. 2*a points input samples are used to calculate each output data point.
